text.section: This section applies only in Harford County.
There is a Class CCFA (continuing care facility for the aged) beer, wine and liquor license in Harford County.

A Class CCFA license authorizes the holder to sell beer, wine, and liquor on the licensed premises:
For consumption only on the licensed premises; and
During the hours and days for sale specified in § 11-513(b)(1) of this article.
The distance restrictions in § 9-213(b) of this article do not apply to the holder of a Class CCFA license.
